message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. Given its exceptional quality and features, it's valued at $12000 by us. Considering its worth to you is $8000, I believe we can find a mutually beneficial agreement. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering the product at $9500. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also leaves room for negotiation if necessary. I look forward to your positive response.
